item.title: Tools for Optimizing Sleep & Sleep-Wake Timing
item.description: Sleep is the foundation of mental and physical health and performance. Optimizing sleep can lead to better focus, energy, mood, and overall wellbeing. Here are some key tools discussed in the podcast for improving sleep quality: Morning Routines Get bright sunlight in eyes within 30-60 mins of waking to set circadian rhythm and cortisol levels.
